metadata.title: Froebel’s int’l school students visit TBH’s Science Lab

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 19 (APP):A delegation of students from Froebel's International School, F-11 Campus, led by their teachers and Principal, visited The Black Hole (TBH) Science Lab on Wednesday. The delegation was warmly received by TBH Science Lab Head, Sadia Manzoor, who provided a comprehensive briefing on the lab's history, objectives, and operations. As part of the visit, Sadia Manzoor conducted a special session showcasing various scientific experiments, including electroplating, measuring gravity using a pendulum, and demonstrating Ohm's Law, among others. To enhance hands-on learning, students were divided into groups for practical exercises, allowing them to apply scientific concepts in an interactive environment. It is worth mentioning here that TBH is a non-profit organization open-to-all, casual educational and intellectual space for science, art, and culture.
